name: Tales of Clicker Knights RPG
description:
This is a demo version for PC which contains only the first stage. Full version is in the works.

For a browser playable demo please visit Tales of Clicker Knights RPG Web Demo page.

Hire soldiers and evolve and promote them to become legendary knights to help your quest to rescue the Princess. Upgrade your weapons and hone your skills and abilities to ensure success in your hunt for the monster king.

This PC demo version does not include:

  • Leaderboard
  • Achievements
  • IAP
  • Watching video to gain gems

We are currently working to bring the full game experience into PC.

Controls:

  • Mouse
  • Esc Key (Back Button) - to open menus and go back to previous screen

Tales of Clicker Knights RPG features:

★ Unique Battle System with simple tapping action
★ Promote and evolve your characters
★ Tons of monsters to battle
★ Collect skills and characters
★ Upgrade your weapon
★ Hire knights and evolve them to a worthy warriors!

For a more comprehensive list of features and gameplay tips, please visit the official website of Tales of Clicker Knights RPG
